java.lang.Object
  com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport.ScopeFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
ItemScopeFilter, SetScopeFilter
public abstract class ScopeFilter
extends Object

A description of the scope within which the search for a SearchNode should take place.
